events.message: I have not received my order even though the expected delivery date was two days ago. Can you please check why the shipment is delayed?
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment past the expected arrival date.
Your case has been assigned to one of our delivery specialists who will review the shipment status and follow up shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your delayed order. I understand this is frustrating and I’m here to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address so I can check the tracking details for you?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the delivery address is 456 Elm Street, Springfield. Please let me know what you find.
I have contacted the carrier and they confirmed the package is delayed due to weather conditions. They expect delivery within the next 48 hours.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the quick response, and I’ll wait for the package to arrive as advised.
We have confirmed that your package was delivered this morning. Please check your doorstep or with neighbors and let us know if you have not received it.
Just following up to ensure that you received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back from you and the issue appears resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
